verses.text: Now it came to pass, when \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w*, and \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w*, and \w Geshem|strong="H1654"\w* the \w Arabian|strong="H6163"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that I had \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, and \add that\add* there was no \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* therein; (\w though|strong="H1571"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* I had not set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* upon the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*;)

That \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* and \w Geshem|strong="H1654"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, let us \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* in \add some one of\add* the \w villages|strong="H3715"\w* in the \w plain|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Ono|strong="H0207"\w*. But they \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* me \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*.

And I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, so that I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*: why should the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, \w whilst|strong="H0834"\w* I \w leave|strong="H7503"\w* it, and come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to you?

Yet they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto me \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* after this \w sort|strong="H1697"\w*; and I \w answered|strong="H7725"\w* them after the same \w manner|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* unto me in like \w manner|strong="H1697"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w* with an \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w letter|strong="H0107"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*;

Wherein \add was\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, It is \w reported|strong="H8085"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w Gashmu|strong="H1654"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \add it, that\add* thou and the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w think|strong="H2803"\w* to \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w*: for which \w cause|strong="H3651"\w* thou \w buildest|strong="H1129"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, that thou mayest \w be|strong="H1933"\w* their \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, according to these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft Gashmu: also called, Geshem\f*

And thou hast also \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* to \w preach|strong="H7121"\w* of thee at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add There is\add* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: and now shall it be \w reported|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* according to these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*. \w Come|strong="H3212"\w* now therefore, and let us take \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

Then I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There \w are|strong="H1961"\w* no such \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w* as thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, but thou \w feignest|strong="H0908"\w* them out of thine own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

For they all made us \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w weakened|strong="H7503"\w* from the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, that it be not \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. Now therefore, \add O God\add*, \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

Afterward I \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Delaiah|strong="H1806"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mehetabeel|strong="H4105"\w*, who \add was\add* shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let us meet \w together|strong="H3259"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, and let us \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*: for they will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* thee; yea, in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* will they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* thee.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Should \w such|strong="H3644"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* as I \w flee|strong="H1272"\w*? and who \add is there\add*, that, \add being\add* as I \add am\add*, would \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* to save his \w life|strong="H2425"\w*? I will not go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

And, lo, I \w perceived|strong="H5234"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him; but that he \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* this \w prophecy|strong="H5016"\w* against me: for \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* and \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* had \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* him.

Therefore \add was\add* he \w hired|strong="H7936"\w*, that I should be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, and do \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, and \add that\add* they might have \add matter\add* for an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w report|strong="H8034"\w*, that they might \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w* me.

My \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w think|strong="H2142"\w* thou upon \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* and \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* according to these their \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, and on the \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w* \w Noadiah|strong="H5129"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, that would have put me in \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*.

¶ So the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* was \w finished|strong="H7999"\w* in the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of \add the month\add* \w Elul|strong="H0435"\w*, in \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it came to pass, that when all our \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add thereof\add*, and all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that \add were\add* about \w us|strong="H5439"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add these things\add*, they were \w much|strong="H3966"\w* cast \w down|strong="H5307"\w* in their own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: for they \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* that this \w work|strong="H4399"\w* was \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Moreover in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sent|strong="H1980"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w letters|strong="H0107"\w* unto \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w*, and \add the letters\add* of \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 6.17 \ft sent…: Heb. multiplied their letters passing to Tobiah\f*

For \add there were\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sworn|strong="H1167"\w* unto him, because he \add was\add* the son in \w law|strong="H2860"\w* of \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Arah|strong="H0733"\w*; and his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3076"\w* had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*.

Also they \w reported|strong="H0559"\w* his good \w deeds|strong="H2896"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, and \w uttered|strong="H3318"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* to him. \add And\add* \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H0107"\w* to put me in \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*.\f + \fr 6.19 \ft words: or, matters\f*
